title: Not able to accept a new game if previous Que was declined?!?!?
body:
Alright, so i'll try and explain the problem as best as I can:

I've been Queing up for ranked solo/duo and let's say a que pops, If i accept it, but someone else declines it, then the window to accept a game is still there but just grayed out, then if another one comes up, there's nothing I can do to close the old one that was open or accept a new one. I'm currently in the new beta client V7.3-3845603.3845421. This problem just started after the most recent patch. I seriously need help because I can't take the risk of potentially not being able to accept too many games that come up then get a penalty, it's already happened once where I got the time. and I'm not going to lose LP over this issue cause I know Riot won't give it back.
Any help would be greatly appreciated.

replies.body:
This may be happening if your connection to the matchmaking servers is unstable. Our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) goes over steps that usually resolve these issues, so I strongly recommend giving those steps a go.

Let me know if this resolved the issue.

I had the same issue with only the new client

Switching back to the old one corrected it

This same thing is happening to me. I already was on low spec mode, so I turned off animations, and the first queue returned me after a dodge, so maybe that did the trick? I literally tried it 2 minutes ago, so not exactly a lot of trial and error :)
